protein.specific_function: Couples signals from receptor and cytoplasmic tyrosine kinases to the Ras signaling pathway

reference.reference_text: Feng GS, Ouyang YB, Hu DP, Shi ZQ, Gentz R, Ni J: Grap is a novel SH3-SH2-SH3 adaptor protein that couples tyrosine kinases to the Ras pathway. J Biol Chem. 1996 May 24;271(21):12129-32.
